traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Euryale fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Special Equipment
entries: Euryale carries one half of a pair of Sending Stones; the other half of the pair is held by Asteria.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Euryale makes three attacks. If she is in serpent form, only one of these attacks can be Constrict.

actions.name: Constrict (Serpent Form Only)
entries: Melee atk +11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one Large or smaller creature. 16 (2d10 + 5 damage) bludgeoning damage, and the target has the {@condition grappled} condition (escape DC 19). Until this grapple ends, the target takes 11 (2d10 damage) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns, and Euryale can't constrict another target.

actions.name: Snake Bite
entries: Melee atk +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5 damage) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or have the {@condition poisoned} condition until the start of Euryale's next turn.

actions.name: Verdant Bolt (Medusa Form Only)
entries: Ranged Spell atk +11 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. 18 (4d8 damage) acid damage.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Euryale moves up to her speed.

legendary.name: Venomous Strike (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Euryale makes one Snake Bite attack. If the target has the {@condition poisoned} condition, the attack deals an extra 16 ({@damage 3d10}) poison damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Medusa Form Only)
headerEntries: Euryale casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 19}):
